QuestData.Title: Torga, the Turtle Loa
QuestData.Description:
Name's Lashk. We're not here to join any cause, we just want to hear Torga's legendary stories.
I don't know if he'll help, but you can try persuading Torga, loa of the turtles, and see if he'll help you fight these blood trolls.
You can join on our pilgrimage to Torga, just keep quiet. Follow the path and find Kisha, she'll tell you where to go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the tortollan pilgrimage path to reach Torga, loa of the turtles.
